resources.string: Voltix is a secure, multi-device crypto vault, compatible with 30+ chains and 10,000+ tokens. Voltix is fully self-custodial.
Voltix does not track your activities or require any registrations. Voltix is fully open-source, ensuring transparency and trust.
Voltix is audited and secure. Join thousands of users who trust Voltix with their digital assets.
Keep devices on the same WiFi Network with VOLTIX open.
